SELECT '' AS VALUE, '전체' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION
SELECT NMCODE_CD AS VALUE, NMCODE_NM AS NAME FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} /* (1:실사, 2:조정, 3:폐기) */ AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '134'
AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '135'
AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '136'
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT NMCODE_CD AS VALUE, NMCODE_NM AS NAME FROM TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} /* (1:실사, 2:조정, 3:폐기) */ AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '134'
AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '135'
AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '136'
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY VALUE NULLS FIRST, VALUE ASC
